summary: Tested technician workflow features: Calendar shows assigned issues, Start Work moves to Services, Warranty resolution creates child repair task with 24h timer, Service Records shows parent (Awaiting Repair) and child (Repair Task) with Continue button. All 5 requested features are working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Technician workflow is fully functional. Test data: Issue 2026_VLN-001_01_14_5 is parent (Awaiting Repair), 2026_VLN-001_01_14_6 is child repair task (now in_progress after Continue click), 2026_VLN-001_01_14_7 is resolved warranty service. Timer shows ~24h countdown correctly.

calendar_shows_assigned_issues.notes: Calendar shows issue 2026_VLN-001_01_14_5 with 'in_progress' status, Customer Issue badge, and SLA timer (11h 53m left). Monthly Summary shows 1 Total Task, 1 In Progress, 1 Customer Issue.

start_work_moves_to_services.notes: Backend API test confirms: When issue status changes from 'open' to 'in_progress', it appears in Services 'In Progress Issues' section. Frontend shows empty In Progress section because current test issues are already past this stage.

warranty_resolution_creates_child.notes: Backend API test confirms: Resolving with warranty_service_type='warranty' creates child repair task with is_warranty_route=true, parent_issue_id set, and warranty_status='warranty'. Parent status changes to 'in_service'.

service_records_shows_parent_and_child.notes: Service Records (3) section shows: 1) Resolved issue 2026_VLN-001_01_14_7, 2) Repair Task 2026_VLN-001_01_14_6 with Continue button and 23h 56m timer, 3) Awaiting Repair 2026_VLN-001_01_14_5 (parent).

continue_button_for_warranty_repairs.notes: Continue button visible on repair task. Clicking it: 1) Shows toast 'Started working on repair task', 2) Changes button to 'Complete Repair', 3) Updates issue status to in_progress.

timer_shows_24h_countdown.notes: Timer badge shows '23h 55m left' on repair task. Timer calculates from issue created_at + 24 hours. Shows urgent styling when < 6 hours remaining.

current_data_state.notes: Issue 2026_VLN-001_01_14_5 is in_service (Awaiting Repair), 2026_VLN-001_01_14_6 is warranty route in_progress (Repair Task), 2026_VLN-001_01_14_7 is resolved warranty service
